text: Jean-Luc Godard (3 December 1930 - 13 September 2022) was a French-Swiss movie director, producer, editor, cinematographer, writer and actor. He was born in Paris to a French mother and Swiss father. The English film magazine Sight and Sound called him one of the top three film directors of all time. Breathless, based on a story by Francois Truffaut, is one of his most famous movies.Godard, Jean-Luc 2002. The Future(s) of Film: three interviews 2000â€“01. Bern; Berlin: Verlag Gachnang & Springer. ISBN 978-3-906127-62-0 He was married to Anna Karina from 1961 until they divorced in 1965. Godard died by assisted suicide on 13 September 2022 in Rolle, Switzerland at the age of 91.Jean-Luc Godard est mort Jean-Luc Godard revolutionized cinema with jump cuts, intertextuality, political commentary, breaking the fourth wall, nonlinear narratives, and innovative aesthetics. ==References== ==Other websites== *Godard entry at the Criterion collection * Category:Actors from Paris Category:Cinematographers Category:French screenwriters Category:Movie directors from Paris Category:French movie editors Category:Movie producers from Paris Category:Swiss movie actors Category:Swiss movie directors Category:Swiss screenwriters Category:Swiss movie producers Category:Writers from Paris Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths by euthanasia
title: Jean-Luc Godard
